review: Brilliant doctor,Master in his field,very caring, cheerful and explains the patient concern very carefully and decent manner.Loads of experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr L Tomer listen to the problem throughly , he takes details of history  related to the problem and further advise test and medicine. He does not prescribe unnessary medicine. 
I have taken medicine for 4 month. Now i am fine and he suggested no medcine required further

Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Initially the junior Doctor asked to get xray done. After waiting for 1 hour (post-x-ray) Dr. L. Tomar said there is no use of X Ray and to get MRI!

Said the reason for pain could be anything (bursa, meniscus or ligament), and possibly to try physiotherapy and come back after 10 days. Finally, when asked what to tell the physiotherapist, he said they know their job ******

Not friendly and not willing to explain enough and have a conversation. On being told that I have a related medical issue, he just said I should not be doing anything for fitness *****. 

All in all, very bad experience, not at all recommended.

I am not at all satisfied with his behaviour. Also runs his lab and often directed patient to get necessary tests conducted from his own shop ***** ******** **** ** ****** ** **** ******
I have experienced where after one visit he had suggested to do MRI scan afterwards just seeing the report he charges again *********** ***** I don't think that that i would ever recommend this doctor to anybody for treatment. ***** *** ***** **** ******* *** ***********
Regards

" I was suffering from arthritis problems with my both knees for several years and consulted many orthopaedic doctors before but meeting Dr L Tomar. At that time my condition had worsened and I could not walk without severe pain in my legs. Dr Tomar asked me a lot of questions regarding the treatments I had undertaken and studied my past reports. *** ********* *** **** ********* ** *** ******* **** ** ********** ** ******* *** **** *********** ******** At that time I thought I probably would never be able to walk the way I did before. But, thanks to Dr L Tomar, I can now walk again as I did before. * ***** *** ****** *** *** **** ** *** ****** ** *** **** * ********* *********** ******* ******** * ** **** ** ** *** **** *** ** *** *** I wish him and all people best of luck."

Hello all 
I would never suggest the clinical consultancy to such doctor as my. Brother went for treatment just for injury treatment and suggestion which was given was totally injustice as. He suggested that legs have to be removed but afterwards when we went to other docter he suggested ******* **** **** ** ******** *** **** ******* ********* ***** ** ****** ** **** *** *******
I would like to suggest atleast dont make a pateint that much panic that he looses his hopes.
I hope my suggestion would be helpfull for others and also for the docter.
God bless you.

The Doctor was fine but the system of online booking doesn’t help as they receive patient as and how they wish.
I had to wait for an hour for the Doctor to come. I understand that at times there are certain urgency that needs to be taken care of but that doesn’t means you ll take the liberty to squander some other persons time.
After coming to the clinic the receptionist sent the patient according to her own whims and ignoring the fact that some had taken prior appointment.
Overall I would say it’s better to go directly rather than taking appointment online.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was having a Road traffic accident and got injured very badly in fact As per some doctor I will not be able to walk with my leg no more .
In the mean time one if my relative who have gone through a Surgery By Dr L Tomar suggest me to go for a consultation by Dr Tomar and I meet the Dr for the same,Dr.done a small procedure.
After that I feel like Dr Done any magic and now I play cricket and all whatever I wants to play.

Thanks Dr Tomar and team for doing the great fouver to give a second chance to live.......
Good experience to meet doctor and I hope for better treatment for my son.  Dr. Advice after reports will come

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: L Tomar doesn't believe is listening to the patient. He is always in a hurry and not available over phone if case of emergencies. I won't recommend this doctor to anyone.
Brilliant doctor,Master in his field,very caring, cheerful and explains the patient concern very carefully and decent manner.Loads of experience.
